macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stocks Surge as Dow Surpasses 50,000 for First Time
items.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 1,206.95 points or 2.47% to 50,115.67 on February 6, 2026, marking the first time it surpassed 50,000. S&P 500 gained 1.97% to 6,932.30 and Nasdaq rose 2.18% to 23,031.21 amid a broad market rebound.

items.title: Bitcoin Reclaims $70K After $1B Leverage Washout
items.summary: Bitcoin surged nearly 15% to reclaim $70,000 on February 6, 2026, following a three-day sell-off and leverage washout, while gold and silver also recovered sharply.

items.title: US Consumer Sentiment Hits Six-Month High, Boosting Fed Rate Cut Bets
items.summary: US Consumer Sentiment Index reached 57.3, a six-month high in early February 2026, easing fears of a hard landing and lowering short-term Treasury yields while increasing expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut.

items.title: Tech Stocks Rebound with Nvidia and Broadcom Leading Gains
items.summary: Nvidia and Broadcom rose nearly 8% and 7% respectively on February 6, 2026, after earlier declines, while Oracle and Palantir gained 4%; Philadelphia Semiconductor Index climbed 5.7%.

items.title: Amazon Guides $200B Capex for 2026 Driven by AI Growth
items.summary: Amazon shares fell after reporting 2026 capital spending guidance of about $200 billion, primarily for AWS AI growth, amid concerns over high spending forecasts.

items.title: Warren Buffett Indicator Nears All-Time High at 218%
items.summary: The Buffett indicator (total US stock market cap to GDP) stood at 218% as of February 6, 2026, near its all-time high and well above the 20-year average of 127%, signaling stretched valuations.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Global Crypto Market Cap Hits $2.34T with 4.43% Daily Gain; BTC at $70,483
items.summary: The cryptocurrency market cap rose 4.43% to $2.34T in the last 24 hours, with Bitcoin trading up 2.96% to $70,483 after ranging between $67,582 and $70,797. Major coins like ETH (+4.34%) and SOL (+3.69%) also gained, while top performers included ZIL (+22%) and F (+18%).

items.title: Bithumb Exchange Mistakenly Records 620,000 BTC Payout, Revealing Internal Flaws
items.summary: South Korean crypto exchange Bithumb erroneously recorded a payout of 620,000 Bitcoins due to an employee's input error, exposing weaknesses in internal controls and off-chain ledger systems. The exchange suspended trading and plans to implement two-level approvals.

items.title: Richecoin (RIC) Lists on BitMart and AscendEX, Boosting Riche Chain Accessibility
items.summary: Richecoin, the native token of the QBFT-powered Riche Chain Layer-1 blockchain, announced listings on BitMart and AscendEX, enhancing global access and supporting enterprise-grade Web3 infrastructure with instant finality and high throughput.

items.title: BNB Overtakes XRP in Market Cap Rankings as BTC Retests $70K
items.summary: BNB has surpassed XRP to claim the fourth spot in market capitalization amid Bitcoin retesting $70K levels during the weekend market activity.

items.title: Bitcoin Sentiment Plunges to 'Extreme Fear' as Price Dips Toward $60K
items.summary: Crypto Fear & Greed Index hit extreme fear (5-11/100) with BTC falling to ~$60K, sparking 427% surge in 'crypto capitulation' searches, though on-chain data shows deleveraging and potential accumulation signals.

items.title: Crypto Exchange Accidentally Sends $40B in Bitcoin to Users
items.summary: A cryptocurrency exchange reportedly sent $40 billion worth of Bitcoin to users by mistake, highlighting ongoing risks in exchange operations.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook Defends AI Progress Amid Criticism
items.summary: Tim Cook highlighted active user engagement with Apple Intelligence features like live translation, AI writing tools, and visual intelligence on iPhones. Apple is partnering with Alphabet on foundation models and plans a Siri relaunch as an AI chatbot later in 2026.

items.title: Guernsey Financial Services Commission Encourages AI Adoption in Finance
items.summary: The GFSC is promoting the use of AI tools, machine learning, large language models, and generative AI to boost efficiency in financial services. Firms can implement these innovations under existing regulations without prior approval.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Rockstar Confirms GTA 6 Fully Handcrafted, No Generative AI, Targets November 2026 Release
items.summary: Rockstar Games has reaffirmed that GTA VI will feature handcrafted worlds built 'street by street' without generative AI for creative content, emphasizing human artistry. The game is now set for release on November 19, 2026, after previous delays.

items.title: Unmorned VR and Adrian's Quest Announced for PSVR2
items.summary: Developers have announced Unmorned VR, a VR adaptation driven by community demand, and a PSVR2 version of the adventure game Adrian's Quest featuring first-person shooter elements and physics puzzles.

items.title: Mario Tennis Fever Tops Nintendo Switch 2 eShop Charts Ahead of Launch
items.summary: Mario Tennis Fever dominates the latest Nintendo Switch 2 eShop charts for the week of February 8, 2026, building hype just days before its release.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
